attributes.action: Bring back fox hunting, and save the british countryside
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Before fox hunting was banned, the population of foxes was barely touched by the number killed via hunting with the dogs.
Since the ban, the countryside has become over run by the vermin and the amount of live-stock lost is devastating.
The ban should never have been imposed in the first place, banning a country tradition is outrageous.
Bring back fox hunting

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
